footnotes.footnote: All transactions reported in this Form 5 using Transaction Code P4 represent previously unreported acquisitions under broker-sponsored dividend reinvestment programs.

As of October 31, 2018 (the most recent fiscal year end), the total number of shares directly owned was 194,531.8408, after giving effect to all of the transactions reported on this Form 5. The amounts otherwise appearing in column 5 are automatically generated by the software used to prepare this report and do not reflect all direct holdings as of the date of the transaction being reported.
